Those young people in the streets of #Ukraine, with freezing temperatures, are writing the new narrative for #Europe. #EUNarrative
When we see in the cold streets of Kiev,men&women with the European flag,it's because they are also fighting for #Ukraine&for their future.
#Ukrainians know that #Europe is not just the land of opportunity, but also a  promise of #hope and #freedom. #EUNarrative
#EU has the right and the duty to stand by the people of #Ukraine in this very difficult moment. #EUNarrative
Read my full statement on the current situation in #Ukraine at http://t.co/XusOP6NeeE and watch it at: http://t.co/nGoBJHFq1Y. #EUNarrative

We have completed a series of initiatives for the development of the medical sector, "Al-Asaf Al-Azhani Al-Amarati http://t.co/lZnt07APJ9

We have agreed with the government and with the people of the field and with the people of the UAE on the most important ideas in the medical sector, and the next phase the stage of implementation and work
We received a lot of special suggestions from participants from the sister countries, and took us together. All thanks to their love for the UAE and their participation with us.

The development of medical services is a government priority, the health of our citizens is not measured at cost, and treatment wherever it is found is the right of them. #Africa_English_Xinhua http://t.co/kn4JcLhFro
The government and the people of the UAE are one team .. The ideas are diverse and creative .. The vision is unified .. Implementation will be shared.
I thank all those who contributed to the success of the "storm" of my mind, which has reached 82 thousand ideas in less than a week. The challenge is now in implementation.

Today we concluded our ministerial retreat. We launched a set of initiatives for the health sector #uaebrainstorm http://t.co/rPxXVv5m0M

We received more than 82K ideas, thanks to everyone's participation in #uaebrainstorm. Executing the selected ideas is our challenge now

Canada is deeply concerned by the situation in Ukraine. The Ukrainian gov't must respect the rights of its citizens to protest peacefully.
Canada & like minded allies will be closely monitoring developments & considering all options. Read my full statement http://t.co/q1f1RfjsMn
We have concluded today with the work of the Summit of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries. I thank all of Kuwait and its wise Emir for their hospitality and organization
We also thank all Gulf countries, especially Kuwait, for their support of the UAE to host the Expo 2020. The support of the State of Kuwait was distinctive, encouraging and appreciated.

The decisions of the summit to consolidate economic and defense cooperation between the GCC countries reflect the wisdom of its leaders, serve the interests of its peoples and strengthen its position globally.
The GCC countries are keen to achieve lasting stability in our Arab region because it is the key to sustainable development and building a true future for future generations
Of the 34th Gulf Summit in Kuwait, which ended shortly before http://t.co/SpKNncFhWU
Launched my Instagram account! Click here and check it out http://t.co/VuPugqIFtY
More than 1 in 10 Dutch employees work for a foreign company. Reason enough for a conversation. Photo: http://t.co/VHoCEEphnM
Our Government is supporting several new scholarships in honor of Nelson Mandela. Learn more: http://t.co/FPKQ47nRTV #cdnpoli
We concluded The Gulf Cooperation Council Summit. All the thanks to Kuwait and HH the Amir of Kuwait for the well-organized 34th meeting
We also wish to thank all the Gulf countries and specifically Kuwait for supporting the UAE's bid to host Expo2020
We decided to further strengthen the economic and defense cooperation among our countries to better serve our people and our global position
The GCC countries are keen on achieving permanent stability in the Arab region to create sustainable development towards a better future

I ended my visit in Israel and as a result, strengthened cooperation ties in agricultural and security issues.
I also had the opportunity to visit the reservoir in Israel where we learned about irrigation systems and farming techniques.
I spoke with the Israeli Minister of Defense who expressed his willingness to train Guatemalan security personnel.
No doubt this visit came to strengthen the bonds of friendship and cooperation between both countries. http://t.co/kdkToyXNj9
Dementia steals lives - that's why I told the #G8DementiaSummit I want the fight against it to be as great as the fight against cancer.
